about.title: About AgentifUI
about.subtitle: Connecting AI with enterprises, creating new experiences with large language models

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: AgentifUI is committed to leveraging the power of large language models to provide innovative application solutions for enterprises. We integrate capabilities from multiple model providers and provide stable, reliable services based on Dify backend, helping organizations fully utilize the value of AI technology.

items.title: Technical Innovation
items.description: Continuously integrate cutting-edge large model technologies to provide leading AI solutions for enterprises

items.title: Data Security
items.description: Support private deployment and strict data protection measures to ensure the security and privacy of enterprise data

items.title: Flexible Customization
items.description: Provide highly customizable solutions to meet specific needs of different industries and scenarios

items.title: Knowledge Enhancement
items.description: Integrate private knowledge bases through RAG technology to enhance model's contextual awareness capabilities

copyright.suffix: . Explore the future of large model applications.
